title: PBE patch

replies.body: The PBE Store was still closed earlier today, you weren't being placed back on a previous patch by mistake.
You cant get on the store at all, it has been disabled for everyone. as with loot.{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}
ok thank you, the pbe service status says its open so i got confused

Hi i am playing PBE now, and same here, client dont work as well : Loot, Shop and Match History 

Can anybody tell me how to fix it ?
